Html:
I'd like the be able to click and drag to reorder them. I'm not sure if its possible. Any suggestions on where to start to use/implement this?

Also, any suggestions for being able to close one? Is there a standard place to place an icon to close a tab?

Thanks!
Sounds doable, you'll need to check the ModernTab control. There's no standard place for an icon in the tab control, that's totally up to you.
